  2. Nvidia's RTX 5090 power cables may be doomed to burn  Tom's Hardware
  3. Another User Sees Melting Of 16-Pin Connector On The PSU Side, But This Time With NVIDIA’s RTX 5080  Wccftech
  4. RTX Cablegate update: First RTX 5080 cable melts, more 5090 cases, MODDIY changes its upgrade recommendation page  VideoCardz.com
  5. Nvidia’s RTX 5090 power connectors are melting  The Verge

item.title: Google Messages just flipped the switch on self-RCS messaging - Android Police
item.description:
1. Google Messages just flipped the switch on self-RCS messaging  Android Police
  2. You Can Now Text Yourself via RCS on Google Messages (and You Should)  Lifehacker
  3. Google Messages now lets you send yourself RCS messages – trust me, it’s more useful than it sounds  TechRadar
  4. Apple iPhone And Android Messages Are Getting More Sophisticated Features  Forbes
  5. Google Messages preps deleting sent RCS messages ‘for everyone’  9to5Google
